result.title: Stuck at problem ICE AND CAVE- round 301
result.content: I've been stuck at this problem for days now: (http://codeforces.com/contest/540/problem/C) It's a simple breadth first search problem. Here's my solution Note that I have used the same convention of '.' and 'X' states as in problem but have introduced ';' as a third state that the block is now unreachable. I am receiving some error on the 62nd test case which I am not able to see due to the test case dimensions. I wish i could download the test case. Can anyone please help me try to figure out the error? Any help will be appreciated.
